classes.name: key-value__label
classes.description: Class available to extend the default label look and feel

classes.name: key-value__group
classes.description: Wrapping element to contain the value and unit and serve as a style hook

classes.name: key-value__value
classes.description: Class available to extend the default value look and feel

classes.name: key-value
classes.description: Wrapping element reserved to style hooks into the component

classes.name: key-value__units
classes.description: Class to set up a relational relative font-size to the container

description: The **key-value pair** component allows you to prominently display merged informational content in a dashboard.
name: Key-Value Pair
usage:
The Key-Value component extends the typography component. You can place any of the font-sizing typography classes on the `.key-value__group` element and the component will proportionally adjust the child element font size. ```html

LOREM IPSUM

12345 units
```
